name: SeaScape Manor Bed & Breakfast

reviews.text: This is a lovely B&B with views of the ocean. Seascape is very accommodating providing a great breakfast and very comfortable beds. If you plan to stay at Seascape Manor when most of the rooms are booked, hop right out of bed and get in the shower early in the morning. If you don't, you will bathe in icecubes and don't plan on getting a warm shower before the afternoon! The upstairs showers seem to have problems that the owners won't acknowledge ... they either scalding hot water or freezing and you are constantly backing off trying to adjust the water between hot and cold. This is not an inexpensive B&B and other guests have complained, but the owners don't seem to care, maybe because there is no remedy.
reviews.title: Nice place, but ...

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed June 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed at Seascape for our anniversary on June 29 to July 1 in the Precious Moments room.
reviews.title: Beautiful, Romantic Weekend Getaway

likes.liked: — Romantic atmosphere, Peaceful, Room, View, Closeness to beaches

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This B&B is immaculately kept. The grounds are beautiful with a ton of blooming flowers and nice relaxing porches and decks. The parlor was also very comfortable looking although we only really walked thru.
reviews.title: Amazing!

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed July 2006, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Our room was very romantic. Loved the soaking tub although unfortunately only used our first night. Waking up to see the sunrise out the balcony doors is amazing. Bed was very comfortable. Towels were nice and soft. Bathroom was very clean with bubble bath for the soaking tub.
reviews.title: dissapointed guest

reviews.text: We, for one, loved the cats and dog. It gives the place a very homey feel. We have been to quite a few B&B and almost all have had animals wandering. If you don't like cats or dogs, then a B&B is probably not for you.
reviews.title: seascape manor

reviews.text: We found the whole atmosphere very tranquil and relaxing.
reviews.title: Romantic Getaway

description: High on a hill overlooking the Atlantic Ocean SeaScape Manor welcomes guests with her comfortable hospitality. Antique filled rooms, private decks, private bathrooms, oversized tubs,gourmet breakfasts, fireplaces, cozy down comforters, great restaurants, hiking and biking trails,& Sandy Hook National Park all await the weary traveler looking for fun and relaxation. Business travelers will appreciate the Wifi, fax machine and business friendly policies. Escape to elegance today.
